metadata.title: CVE-2018-20783 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In PHP before 5.6.39, 7.x before 7.0.33, 7.1.x before 7.1.25, and 7.2.xbefore 7.2.13, a buffer over-read in PHAR reading functions may allow anattacker to read allocated or unallocated memory past the actual data whentrying to parse a .phar file. This is related to phar_parse_pharfile inext/phar/phar.c.

criterions.comment: php5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
